abstract.t: This draft proposes mechanisms for the establishment and maintenance ofMPLS Traffic Engineering (TE) Label Switched Paths (LSP) that traversemultiple regions, where a region could be an IGP Area or an AutonomousSystem or a GMPLS overlay network. This document also outlines differentmechanisms that an operator could employ within his region to facilitatethe setup of these inter-region TE LSPs.
